name: Deflect Pong
description:
Short game made as part of Week 1 for a Game-a-week challenge!

2-player pong-esque game with an Overwatch theme

Controls:

P1: 

W, S (Move up/Move down)

P2:

Up arrow, Down arrow(Move up/Move Down)

Win Condition:

First player to get 5 fire strikes past the other wins!

To deflect a fire strike, simply move in front of it to block it from passing you.
